document.full_text: a freelance journalist who worked for reuters was among more than 50 people killed on tuesday when gunmen attacked a local government building in tikrit, the hometown of former iraqi leader saddam hussein.
document.title: journalist for reuters killed in iraq attack
lines_and_colors: a freelance journalist who worked for reuters was among more than 50 people killed on tuesday when gunmen attacked a local government building in tikrit, the hometown of former iraqi leader saddam hussein.
